testcase.name: Command hello stdout
testcase.system-out: Command: hello: stdout: matches expectation: ["Hello, world!"]

testcase.name: Command hello --version | head -n1 exit-status
testcase.system-out: Command: hello --version | head -n1: exit-status: matches expectation: 0

testcase.name: Command hello --version | head -n1 stdout
testcase.system-out: Command: hello --version | head -n1: stdout: matches expectation: ["hello (GNU hello) 2.6"]

testcase.name: Package hello installed
testcase.system-out: Package: hello: installed: matches expectation: true
